Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Panitide L2 (natural AMPs; XXQ, UCSS1a; 3S=S, plants; Others Panitide L1, Panitide L3; Panitide L4, Panitide L5, Panitide L6, Panitide L7, Panitide L8, Panitide L9, probably inactive MIC>20 uM)

Literature Information.Literature:
N-terminus is a pyroglutamate (XXQ).Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 2.5 uM).Toxicity: 50% hemolysis at 15 uM (HC50=15 uM), highly hemolytic.  
Cytotoxic to hela cells. Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Nguyen GK, Lian Y, Pang EW, Nguyen PQ, Tran TD, Tam JP.2013
Literature Information.Title: Discovery of linear cyclotides in monocot plant Panicum laxum of Poaceae family provides new insights into evolution and distribution of cyclotides in plants.
